# Hugo generated files
/public/
/resources/
/hugo_stats.json

# Local development files
/node_modules/
/.DS_Store
/.idea/
/.vscode/
/Thumbs.db

# Hugo cache and temporary files
/.hugo_build.lock
/.hugo_build.cache/
/.cache/
/tmp/

# Netlify and Vercel deployments
/.netlify/
/.vercel/

# Go dependencies (if using Hugo modules)
/go.mod
/go.sum
/.hugo_build.lock

# Logs and system files
*.log
